tool_description: Generates customized legal intake forms based on case type, jurisdiction, and practice area requirements.

case_type.description: Type of legal case requiring intake forms

error_messages: Unsupported case type: Provide a recognized legal case type
Invalid jurisdiction: Use a valid legal jurisdiction
Unknown practice area: Specify a valid legal practice area
usage: Specify the case type, jurisdiction, and practice area to generate appropriate intake forms with required fields and compliance elements.

required_fields.description: List of mandatory fields for the intake form
